channel.title: Posts on Xophie Moon
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Xophie Moon

item.title: Freedom of Self Expression
item.description: For me to write here continuously is difficult because I am afraid of expressing myself openly. I think for most people under normal circumstances they have little to hide. But this has never been the case for me. However, I now feel that since that is past and I do have a strong sense of being my own person now, I should express myself freely.

item.title: Who Am I
item.description: I want to be Xophie Moon so badly. I feel like this is my identity but I cannot use it in my life because I haven’t come out yet. But I mustn’t fall into self pity. My dreams are close at hand and why shouldn’t I be Xophie Moon! Who determines who I am but me?

item.title: Let's Just Write
item.description: I think I’ll just keep on writing whatever comes to my mind. Right now it’s that I am super casual about writing here.

item.title: Welcome to the Moon
item.description: Hello! Welcome to my beautiful new website! Have a nice day!
